translation.es: El problema del coleccionista de Panini

translation.en: How many packs have to be purchased to complete the Panini album?
translation.es: ¿Cuántos paquetes se deben comprar para completar el album de Panini?

translation.en: Number of total stickers to collect (max 1000)
How many different stickers do you already have? (max 1000)
How many people are you swapping stickers with? (max 15)
Number of rare stickers, if any (max 20)
How much a pack of stickers in your country?
translation.es: ¿Cuánto sale un paquete figuritas en tu pais?

translation.en: On average, you need to purchase
translation.es: En promedio vas a necesitar comprar

translation.en: However, there is a 90% chance that you need at least
translation.es: Sin embargo, hay 90% de probabilidades de que necesites al menos

translation.en: A negative number? It makes no sense!
Please, check the numbers on the left. Something is wrong :-/
translation.es: Por favor, revisa los números de la izquierda. Algo está mal :-/
